Explosions

It is very common for games to need to simulate explosion physics. The Physics Utils package includes the Explosion script to simulate this behavior on rigidbodies. The script works by utilizing the AddExplosionForce function provided by Unity. The script detects the objects within a set radius and applies the force to each. You can customize how the explosion is triggered, the strength of the explosion, fuse time, and more.
